name: tap water production, ultrafiltration treatment | tap water | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11768/documentation

This dataset represents production of 1 kg of tap water under pressure at facility gate, ready for distribution in network. It represents average operation of ultrafiltration treatment for production of tap water. Ultrafiltration treatment includes intake pumping, ultrafiltration through polyvinylidenfluoride hollow fibers membrane and disinfection. Inventory was constructed from reported chemicals, energy inputs and wastes from a single plant located in Québec covering representing 29% of total production of tap water from this technology. Facility has 5 trains each containing 64 modules. Module useful life was assumed to be 10 years based on personal communication with expert from the facility, which is justify mainly from the high quality of intake water.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:; - tap water production and supply, GLO, 2000 - 2000 (58c7c438-e3f3-49e2-a66c-e494dc0dbb20)]

From the intake pumping of raw surface water into the water treatment plant. 

This dataset ends with the production of tap water, at facility gate, under pressure. It includes energy for intake pumping, treatment system, lighting and heating of the building as well as the energy of the pump pressurizing water to the beginning of the network. It includes all chemicals and materials added to the water during treatment and replacement of ultrafiltration modules and pressure vessels. It excludes energy for pumping stations and water losses within the network which is included in the tap water market. Emissions to the environment occurring during the treatment and during the distribution were not considered as they are assumed negligible. Main substance in water that would be released in the environment are assumed to be considered in wastewater processes.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/36:Water collection, treatment and supply/360:Water collection, treatment and supply/3600:Water collection, treatment and supply

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Extrapolated from data from a single plant in Quebec (Canada).The uncertainty was adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: From one ultrafiltration tap water production facilities in Quebec (Canada) to global average of same technology. The uncertainty has been changed accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Based on data collected from a ultrafiltration treatment plant in  Quebec (Canada). See corresponding Quebec dataset for more information. Note that percent representativeness is not supplied because technology-specific global production volumes is too uncertain. Should this information become available, the representativeness can be calculated by dividing the sum of the water treated by the Quebec plants that served as a basis for the Global dataset by the technology-specific global production volume. (3.87E9 kg/a)
